meanings.definition: a type of editing equipment used in film production
meanings.sent1: The filmmakers used moviolas to edit their movie scenes.
meanings.sent2: In the film studio, you can find moviolas for editing purposes.
meanings.sent3: The moviolas at the studio were always busy cutting and splicing film.
meanings.sent4: The moviolas worked tirelessly, shaping the film into a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The clacking sound of the moviolas filled the editing room with excitement.

meanings.definition: the plural form of moviola, a brand name for a type of film editing machine
meanings.sent1: At the film school, students learned how to operate moviolas.
meanings.sent2: The moviolas in the editing room were all in use.
meanings.sent3: During the movie marathon, the moviolas took a break from editing.
meanings.sent4: The moviolas hummed softly, bringing the film to life.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights of the moviolas illuminated the dark editing room.
